body.p: По-русски | In English | Suomeksi | På norsk

The Álgu etymological database Kotus, Finland. In Álgu it is possible to follow the history of single Skolt Sámi words back to all related languages, long into Siberia!. Search for
single words (even Skolt Sámi ones) or browse through the alphabetical list of North Sámi key words.
